items.name: case fill
items.desc: Perform a fill operation on the text.

items.name: case stroke
items.desc: Perform a stroke operation on the text.

items.name: case fillStroke
items.desc: Perform fill, then stroke operations on the text.

items.name: case invisible
items.desc: Do not draw the text, but do update the text position.

items.name: case fillClip
items.desc: Perform a fill operation, then intersect the text with the current clipping path.

items.name: case strokeClip
items.desc: Perform a stroke operation, then intersect the text with the current clipping path.

items.name: case fillStrokeClip
items.desc: Perform fill then stroke operations, then intersect the text with the current clipping path.

items.name: case clip
items.desc: Specifies to intersect the text with the current clipping path. This mode does not paint the text.
